snippet.title: Endless Winter Trailer [Steam]
snippet.description:
Endless Winter is a slightly difficult clearance game. 
Players control the cars passing through varied terrains and mechanisms, and breaking through the obstacles setting up by robots. 
Our story happens in a cold future world which experienced the war between humans and artificial intelligence. 
You can explore the wasteland as a courier. 
You also can challenge all kinds of difficulties with your friends.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/617690/Endless_Winter/
